Hash Brown
items.allergens: Allergens: cooked in shared fryer (possible gluten cross-contact).

items.name: Potato Wedges

groups.title: Weekly Specials (Sold by Weight)

items.name: Price per lb
items.allergens: Allergens vary by item; common: wheat (bread/noodles), dairy (cheese/sauces), soy (some sauces), eggs (dressings), pork (sausage/pulled pork). Cross-contact possible.

groups.note: Buns served with all meals. Spaghetti always available.

items.name: Monday
items.allergens: Sausage, Pulled Pork, Corn on the Cob, Spinach, Mashed Potatoes, Broccoli. Buns contain wheat.

items.name: Tuesday
items.allergens: Baked Chicken, Ground Beef, Broccoli & Cheese, Mac & Cheese, Collards, Green Beans, Tortillas. Common allergens: dairy, wheat, soy.

items.name: Wednesday
items.allergens: Noodles, Fried Rice, Chicken, Corn, Greens. Common allergens: wheat (noodles), egg/soy (fried rice sauces).

items.name: Thursday
items.allergens: Rice (Fried/White), Noodles, Curry Chicken or Lamb, Spinach Curry, Bean Curry, Bread. Common allergens: dairy (some curries), wheat (bread), soy.

items.name: Friday
items.allergens: Chicken Biryani, Green Curry, Mixed Vegetable Curry, Lentil, Bread (Naan/Roti/Tortilla). Common allergens: dairy (some curries), wheat (breads).

items.name: Saturday
items.allergens: Sausage or Chicken or Lamb or Pulled Pork, Greens, Corn, Gravy, Tortilla. Allergens vary; wheat (tortilla), dairy (gravy).

items.name: Supreme
items.allergens: Allergens: wheat/gluten, dairy; may contain soy depending on toppings.

items.name: 6 pc (Plain/Hot/BBQ/Roasted)
items.allergens: Allergens: sauces/dips may contain dairy (ranch/bleu cheese), egg, soy; fried—gluten cross-contact possible.

items.name: 10 pc (Plain/Hot/BBQ/Roasted)
items.allergens: Allergens: sauces/dips may contain dairy (ranch/bleu cheese), egg, soy; fried—gluten cross-contact possible.

items.name: Italiano
items.allergens: Allergens: wheat/gluten, dairy; may contain egg/soy in dressings.

items.name: Steak
items.allergens: Allergens: wheat/gluten, dairy; may contain soy.

items.name: Meatball
items.allergens: Allergens: wheat/gluten, dairy; pork/beef in meatballs; may contain egg/soy.

items.name: French Fries
items.allergens: Allergens: cooked in shared fryer (possible gluten cross-contact).

items.name: Potato Wedges
items.allergens: Allergens: cooked in shared fryer; may contain wheat if breaded.

items.name: French Fries w/ Cheese & Chili
items.allergens: Allergens: dairy (cheese), wheat/soy possible in chili; fried cross-contact.

items.name: Garden Salad (Sm/Lg)
items.allergens: Allergens: dairy/egg/soy depend on dressing; ask if needed.

items.name: Chicken Salad (Sm/Lg)
items.allergens: Allergens: dairy/egg/soy depend on dressing; poultry.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.allergens: Allergens: dairy, egg; crust usually wheat.

items.name: Hot Sauce Cup
items.allergens: Allergens: usually none; may contain soy depending on brand.

items.name: Spaghetti (Sm/Lg)
items.allergens: Allergens: wheat/gluten (pasta), dairy if topped with cheese.
